Summary: Dim flying triangle appeared to be cloak like flyin real fast
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking northeast for comet Hartley 2 when a object just appeared from the same direction I was looking at I saw a triangle object that seemed like it was cloaking and moving soundless and fast enough to be in sight for about 3 to 4 seconds (real fast). My girlfriend was on the porch when she witnessed it for the remaining 1 to 2 sec she said it look like a group of giant bird or planelike objects flying in perfect formation but they're flying too fast. The objects had no lights but appeared to be glowing real dim like it was trying to camouflage in with the sky. It also had not any sound at all and was flying as high in the sky as a bird would. It was real large bout the size of a commercial airplane flying extremely low. . This happened approximately 8:58 to 9:00pm est (10-10-10) and was only in sight about 3 or 4 secs. This was the weirdest thing I seen before.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Tarentum
There were no other sightings in Tarentum on or around October 10th 2010
